title: Royal Thai Army Producing Its Artillery
dc:creator: Stephen W. Miller
description:
A goal of the Royal Thai Army (RTA) has been to increase its self-sufficiency in defense equipment and weapons. As previously reported by AMR its Weapon Production Centres (WPC) have begun producing 5.56 rifle ammunition, 105mm and 155mm howitzer projectiles, and 60mm and 81 mm mortar bombs in new manufacturing facilities built in the last […]

The post Royal Thai Army Producing Its Artillery appeared first on Asian Military Review.
